name: Nexuspad
description: NEXUSPAD PROTOCOL is a multi-utilities launchpad including staking V2 and farming V2 features. The launchpad also implements forecast mechanics which allows the engagement and participation of the broader, less economically fortunate, more beneficial to the investors. Also it introduces the NEXUS token which serves as the essence of launchpad to be required to protect against malicious attacks, governance, and participation in project allocations
